grim/

grim_default_menus.pro


Routines

Routines from grim_default_menus.pro

grim_menu_core_help_event, event

This option allows you extract a brightness profile at the selected location for each plane in the image.

grim_menu_image_profile_help_event, event

This option allows you extract a brightness profile in an arbitrary direction in the image.

grim_menu_ring_box_profile_radial_help_event, event

This option allows you create a radial brightness profile from a rectangular image region. 1) Activate the ring from which you wish to extract the profile. 2) Select this option and use the mouse to outline a ring sector:

grim_menu_ring_box_profile_longitudinal_help_event, event

This option allows you create a longitudinal brightness profile from a rectangular image region. 1) Activate the ring from which you wish to extract the profile. 2) Select this option and use the mouse to outline a ring sector.

grim_menu_ring_profile_radial_help_event, event

This option allows you create a radial brightness profile. 1) Activate the ring from which you wish to extract the profile. 2) Select this option and use the mouse to outline a ring sector: Left Button: the sector is bounded by lines of constant longitude.', $ Middle Button: the sector is selected in an arbitrary direction. Left Button: the sector is bounded by lines perpendicular to the projected longitudinal direction.

grim_menu_ring_profile_longitudinal_help_event, event

This option allows you create a longitudinal brightness profile. 1) Activate the ring from which you wish to extract the profile. 2) Select this option and use the mouse to outline a ring sector.

grim_menu_limb_profile_azimuthal_help_event, event

This option allows you create an azimutal brightness profile about a limb. 1) Activate the planet from which you wish to extract the profile. 2) Select this option and use the mouse to outline a sector.

grim_menu_limb_profile_radial_help_event, event

This option allows you create radial brightness profile across a limb. 1) Activate the planet from which you wish to extract the profile. 2) Select this option and use the mouse to outline a sector.

grim_menu_pointing_farfit_help_event, event

This option produces a rough pointing correction by comparing the active points with edges detected in the image using pg_edges and pg_farfit. 1) Activate the edges that you wish to correlate. 2) Select this option. Only active limbs, terminators, and ring edges are used.

grim_menu_pointing_renderfit_help_event, event

This option uses pg_renderfit to produce a pointing correction by comparing the image with a simulated image.

grim_menu_pointing_lsq_help_event, event

Opens a gr_lsqtool widget.

grim_menu_toggle_reorigin_event_help_event, event

This option allows the user to set whether geometry descriptors are updated whenever the data array is shifted.

grim_menu_shift_enter_step_event_help_event, event

This option prompts the user to enter the step size for the image-shift menu options.

grim_menu_shift_enter_offset_event_help_event, event

This option prompts the user to shift an image by entering an offset.

grim_menu_shift_left_help_event, event

This option shifts the image left and corrects the camera pointing accordingly.

grim_menu_shift_right_help_event, event

This option shifts the image right and corrects the camera pointing accordingly.

grim_menu_shift_up_help_event, event

This option shifts the image up and corrects the camera pointing accordingly.

grim_menu_shift_down_help_event, event

This option shifts the image down and corrects the camera pointing accordingly.

grim_menu_corrections_photometry_help_event, event

Opens a gr_phttool widget.

grim_menu_project_map_help_event, event

Opens a gr_maptool widget.

grim_menu_mosaic_help_event, event

Uses pg_mosaic to combine all visible image planes into a mosaic. The new mosiac is opened in a new grim instance.

Routine details

top grim_menu_core_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_core_event PURPOSE: This option allows you extract a brightness profile at the selected location for each plane in the image. The left button selects a single point, and the right button selects a region to average over. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 7/2016

top grim_menu_image_profile_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_image_profile_event PURPOSE: This option allows you extract a brightness profile in an arbitrary direction in the image. The left button selects the region's length and then width; the right button selects a region with a width of one pixel. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 6/2005

top grim_menu_ring_box_profile_radial_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_ring_box_profile_radial_event PURPOSE: This option allows you create a radial brightness profile from a rectangular image region. 1) Activate the ring from which you wish to extract the profile. 2) Select this option and use the mouse to outline a ring sector: CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 6/2003

top grim_menu_ring_box_profile_longitudinal_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_ring_box_profile_longitudinal_event PURPOSE: This option allows you create a longitudinal brightness profile from a rectangular image region. 1) Activate the ring from which you wish to extract the profile. 2) Select this option and use the mouse to outline a ring sector. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 5/2003

top grim_menu_ring_profile_radial_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_ring_profile_radial_event PURPOSE: This option allows you create a radial brightness profile. 1) Activate the ring from which you wish to extract the profile. 2) Select this option and use the mouse to outline a ring sector: Left Button: the sector is bounded by lines of constant longitude.', $ Middle Button: the sector is selected in an arbitrary direction. Left Button: the sector is bounded by lines perpendicular to the projected longitudinal direction. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 5/2003

CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 5/2003

top grim_menu_limb_profile_azimuthal_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_limb_profile_azimuthal_event PURPOSE: This option allows you create an azimutal brightness profile about a limb. 1) Activate the planet from which you wish to extract the profile. 2) Select this option and use the mouse to outline a sector. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 8/2006

top grim_menu_limb_profile_radial_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_limb_profile_radial_event PURPOSE: This option allows you create radial brightness profile across a limb. 1) Activate the planet from which you wish to extract the profile. 2) Select this option and use the mouse to outline a sector. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 8/2006

top grim_menu_pointing_farfit_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_pointing_farfit_event PURPOSE: This option produces a rough pointing correction by comparing the active points with edges detected in the image using pg_edges and pg_farfit. 1) Activate the edges that you wish to correlate. 2) Select this option. Only active limbs, terminators, and ring edges are used. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 7/2002

top grim_menu_pointing_renderfit_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_pointing_renderfit_event PURPOSE: This option uses pg_renderfit to produce a pointing correction by comparing the image with a simulated image. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 2/2017

top grim_menu_pointing_lsq_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_pointing_lsq_event PURPOSE: Opens a gr_lsqtool widget. Using the current data, camera, active planet, and active ring descriptors. See gr_lsqtool.pro for details. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 8/2002

top grim_menu_toggle_reorigin_event_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_toggle_reorigin_event PURPOSE: This option allows the user to set whether geometry descriptors are updated whenever the data array is shifted. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 12/2016

top grim_menu_shift_enter_step_event_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_shift_enter_step_event PURPOSE: This option prompts the user to enter the step size for the image-shift menu options. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 1/2012

top grim_menu_shift_enter_offset_event_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_shift_enter_offset_event PURPOSE: This option prompts the user to shift an image by entering an offset. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 1/2012

top grim_menu_shift_left_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_shift_left_event PURPOSE: This option shifts the image left and corrects the camera pointing accordingly. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 8/2002

top grim_menu_shift_right_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_shift_right_event PURPOSE: This option shifts the image right and corrects the camera pointing accordingly. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 8/2002

top grim_menu_shift_up_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_shift_up_event PURPOSE: This option shifts the image up and corrects the camera pointing accordingly. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 8/2002

top grim_menu_shift_down_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_shift_down_event PURPOSE: This option shifts the image down and corrects the camera pointing accordingly. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 8/2002

top grim_menu_corrections_photometry_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_corrections_photometry_event PURPOSE: Opens a gr_phttool widget. Using the primary data, camera, planet, and ring descriptors. See gr_phttool.pro for details. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 7/2002

top grim_menu_project_map_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_project_map_event PURPOSE: Opens a gr_maptool widget. Using the primary data, camera, planet, and ring descriptors. See gr_maptool.pro for details. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 7/2002

top grim_menu_mosaic_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_mosaic_event PURPOSE: Uses pg_mosaic to combine all visible image planes into a mosaic. The new mosiac is opened in a new grim instance. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 7/2002
